extendedDescription: 'Has replies' is the only filter that works if not signed in with the script. A 'Following' filter becomes available if you do.

description: $forumComments_description
$forumMedia_description
extendedDescription: The forum preview only shows one tag by default, so it's just going to say 'anime' or 'manga' without telling you which media it's about. This module adds a second tag, shortening the title somewhat if there's not enough space.

description: Add a button to lists to create 3x3's from list entries. Click the button, and then select nine entries
Enable an API for other scripts to control automail [Don't enable this unless you know what you are doing]

$setting_CSSsmileyScore
Hide the global feed
Add filter options to the feeds to hide posts with few comments or likes

Hide status posts containing this word:
extendedDescription:
RegEx syntax accepted too, do not use delimeters.
Most common use, blocking multiple words: "word1|word2|word3"

description: Enable profile backgrounds
Add a colour picker in the footer for adjusting the site themes
Add progress bars to the list previews
$setting_tweets
extendedDescription:
This works by runnig Twitter's official embedding script. But since loading external code is not allowed for Firefox addons, this setting will only work in userscript mode.
Be adviced that Twitter embedding displays NSFW content no differently than other content.

description: Make cards for links to age restricted content

Add fallback text for missing images in the sidebar and favourite sections
Short romaji titles for everyday use. Life is too short for light novel titles

Support for right-to-left flow [under development]
extendedDescription:
A baseline for adjusting Anilist to act more like a native RTL language site would.
Not complete.

description: Do not load images on the low bandwidth feed
extendedDescription:
Refers to the feed located at https://anilist.co/terms if the setting 'low bandwidth feed' is turned on.
For very slow connections, images are going to be the most difficult part of the page to load.
See if your addblocker also supports setting a size limit for media, which may help if you are struggling.

$settings_partialLocalisationLanguage_description
extendedDescription:
Partial localisation. Does not translate the whole site.
For Japanese, you may also want to change your title language at https://anilist.co/settings/media

Want to contribute? See: https://github.com/hohMiyazawa/Automail/issues/69
